ADMINS.description: Your Telegram ID and ID of Users you want add as Admin. Separate each ID by comma.

UPDATE_CHANNEL.description: Your telegram channel username without @ to add force sub. Leave it empty if you don't wanna add. Example: t2linkss

OWNER_ID.description: Get your user id from https://telegram.dog/MissRose_bot

RESULTS_COUNT.description: Number of results retrieved from DB at a time, Maximum: 20

AUTO_DELETE.description: Set to true to automatically delete messages from the chat

AUTO_DELETE_TIME.description: Duration of time in seconds to delete messages from the chat automatically. Default:300 seconds

WELCOME_IMAGE.description: Set the default image for start message

RESULTS_IMAGE.description: Set the default image for results

CHANNELS.description: Set True if you want to save posts from channels

CHANNELS_LIST.description: List of your channel id to save posts to db. Separate each by space. Ex: -100xx -100YYY

FORCESUB.description: Set true if you want to force subscriptions.
